attributes.action: Allow outdoor socially distanced tennis during November lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: The more outdoor spaces we can use the better, to reduce numbers using local parks and to promote physical and mental health.
attributes.background: As a minimum allow singles, though please also consider doubles, outdoors, socially distanced.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow indoor/outdoor tennis courts to operate under strict distancing protocols: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557428

Exempt outdoor tennis from closure due to COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557658
